trigger_phrase: lol, we just spent all this time making the UI theme super dark and neon like a cyberpunk movie, and now we're orchestrating AI agents like we're the hackers in The Matrix - the aesthetic is absolutely perfect for what we're actually doing!

user_reaction: Delighted recognition of the meta-irony - expressing genuine amusement ('lol') at the serendipitous alignment between form and function
